org.jetel.database.dbf

Class DBFAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.database.dbf.DBFAnalyzer

  • public class DBFAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    29.6.2004 Class which analyzes dBase/FoxBase/FoxPRO table/file and extracts metadata about defined fields. Used by DBFDataReader to which it provides neccessary info for reading DBF records.

      • analyze

        public int analyze(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel dbfFile,
          java.lang.String dbfTableName,

            throws java.io.IOException,

        DBFErrorException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method which allows analyzing dBase file/table. It extracts Clover-style metadata from information specified in dBase table header.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • getFields

        public DBFFieldMetadata[] getFields()
        Returns:
        Returns the dbfFields array - contains description if individual fields in dBase table header. If analyzed file has invalid header empty array is returned.

      • getNumFields

        public int getNumFields()
        Returns:
        Returns number of fields defined in table. If analyzed file has invalid header returns -1.

      • getNumRows

        public int getNumRows()
        Returns:
        Returns number of rows present in dBase data file. If analyzed file has invalid header returns -1.

      • getDBFType

        public byte getDBFType()
        Returns:
        Returns the dbfType - can be used to distinguish which dBase version (dBase, FoxBase, FoxPRO) created the data file. If analyzed file has invalid header returns 0.

      • getDBFTypeName

        public java.lang.String getDBFTypeName(byte type)
        Method which returns name (String) of the dBase variant which created analyzed DBF file. For unknown types or if analyzed file has invalid header returns null.
        Returns:

      • getRecSize

        public int getRecSize()
        Returns:
        Returns the dbfRecSize. If analyzed file has invalid header returns -1.

      • getCloverMetadata

        public DataRecordMetadata getCloverMetadata()

      • getDBFCodePage

        public byte getDBFCodePage()
        Returns:
        Returns the dbfCodePage. If analyzed file has invalid header returns 0.

      • getCurrentCharset

        public java.nio.charset.Charset getCurrentCharset()

      • getDBFDataOffset

        public int getDBFDataOffset()
        Returns:
        Returns the dbfDataOffset. If analyzed file has invalid header returns -1.

      • getWarnings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWarnings()
        Returns:
        the warnings

      • getWarning

        public java.lang.String getWarning()
